title.text: A Corpus of Human-written Summaries of Line Graphs

abstractContent.text: We describe a corpus of human-written En-glish language summaries of line graphs.

This corpus is intended to help develop a system to automatically generate summaries capturing the most salient information conveyed byline graphs in popular media, as well as to evaluate the output of such a system.

entities.text: summaries capturing the most salient information conveyed byline graphs in popular media

tableCaptions.text: Table 2: Various descriptive statistics for the corpus.
Table 3: The ten most frequently occurring words in the  corpus (omitting stopwords and punctuation).
